cells.ssca: Medium shot, eye level, front view
cells.videoDesc: A man wearing a white T-shirt and gray pants sits barefoot on a surreal chicken-shaped sofa, pulling hard at the fleshy fabric of the sofa with both hands. The scene is shot from a straight-on, eye-level angle, with soft light spilling onto the light-colored walls and wooden floor, creating a bizarre yet realistic surreal everyday atmosphere, showcasing the interaction between the man and the strange sofa.
cells.visualDesc: A man wearing a white short-sleeved T-shirt and gray pants sits barefoot on a peculiar sofa that resembles raw chicken. He grips the light-colored, fleshy-textured fabric of the sofa with both hands and pulls it upward. The background features light beige walls and wooden flooring, with soft overall lighting that creates a surreal and slightly bizarre everyday scene. The sofa exhibits the texture and shape of raw chicken, with realistic details.

cells.ssca: Medium shot, eye level, front view
cells.videoDesc: A man sits on a white 'cauliflower' sofa, gently handling cabbage leaves with slow, soothing movements. The camera stays steady at eye level, capturing his everyday moments in a minimalist white space. The soft lighting and pristine environment together create a calm and healing atmosphere, ideal for scenes showcasing a simple, lifestyle-oriented style.
cells.visualDesc: A man wearing a white T-shirt and light-colored pants sits barefoot on a uniquely designed white 'cauliflower' sofa. He holds a large cabbage leaf in both hands, which appears motion-blurred due to his movement. The background is a minimalist all-white space, with rounded lines on the walls and furniture. The overall lighting is soft and even, creating a pure and tranquil atmosphere.

cells.ssca: Medium shot, eye level, front view
cells.videoDesc: In a dreamy candy-themed room, a man sits on a cake sofa, manipulating bread topped with pink frosting, with the frosting dripping into chocolate sauce. The camera is fixed at eye level, showcasing the room's abundant dessert decorations and soft lighting, creating a sweet and fantastical atmosphere, highlighting a fairytale-like visual experience.
cells.visualDesc: In the scene, a man wearing a gray T-shirt and blue jeans is sitting on a sofa made of multiple layers of cake, decorated with chocolate sauce and donuts. He is holding a piece of bread with pink frosting in both hands, and the frosting is dripping down the edges of the bread onto the chocolate sauce below. The background is a whimsical candy-themed room, with walls adorned with colorful lollipops and pink arch decorations, and a floor with a pink and white checkerboard pattern. The overall color tone is bright and soft, full of a sweet atmosphere.

cells.ssca: Medium shot, eye level, front view
cells.videoDesc: A man sits barefoot on the floor, intently tearing apart a large golden loaf of bread. The crust is shiny, and the inside is soft. The camera is fixed at eye level, with bright and soft lighting, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere that highlights the tempting texture of the bread and the man's focused actions.
cells.visualDesc: A man wearing a white short-sleeved T-shirt and khaki pants is sitting barefoot on a light wooden floor. He is vigorously tearing apart a huge golden-brown braided bread with both hands. The bread's crust is shiny and golden, while the inside is soft and fluffy. The room is brightly lit, with white walls and a window with panes in the background, and the blurry outlines of trees can be seen outside the window.

cells.ssca: Medium shot, eye level, front view
cells.videoDesc: A man sits on a flame-shaped bed made of red and orange gelatinous structures, lightly touching the bed with his hands. The room is well-lit, with a simple background of wooden floors and white curtains, while the greenery outside the window adds a natural touch. The camera remains at eye level, slowly showcasing the unique design of the bed and its interaction with the man, creating a fantastical yet everyday visual experience.
cells.visualDesc: In the scene, a man wearing a gray T-shirt and gray pants is sitting on a uniquely designed bed. The bed is made of a gelatinous structure interwoven with red and orange, and the headboard is shaped like flames, with bright colors. The room is brightly lit, with wooden floors reflecting natural light. White curtains hang on the window to the right, and green vegetation can be seen outside. The overall environment is simple and bright, and the bed's gelatinous structure appears semi-transparent under the light, with rich color layers.

cells.ssca: Medium shot, eye level, front view
cells.videoDesc: A man wearing a blue T-shirt and khaki pants is sitting on a uniquely shaped pineapple cake chair, holding two slices of pineapple cake in his hands. The shot is taken from a straight-on frontal angle, with bright and soft lighting, creating a relaxed and fun atmosphere that showcases the playful nature of creative food scenes.
cells.visualDesc: A man wearing a blue short-sleeve T-shirt and khaki pants is sitting barefoot on a chair shaped like a pineapple cake. He is holding two pieces of cake with pineapple slices, the surface of the cake golden with pineapple pieces scattered on top. The background is a bright and simple white room, with a window on the left letting in natural light. The overall environment is clean and bright, with soft lighting and shadows.

cells.ssca: Medium shot, eye level, front view
cells.videoDesc: A man sits on a giant kiwi sofa, gently touching the surface with both hands. The camera slowly zooms in, showcasing the details of the sofa and water stains on the floor. The background is a bright and minimalist indoor space, with natural light streaming through an arched window. The overall atmosphere is fresh and whimsical, full of creativity and playfulness.
cells.visualDesc: In the scene, a man wearing a white short-sleeve T-shirt and gray pants sits barefoot on a giant kiwi-shaped sofa. The sofa is cut open to reveal the green flesh and black seeds inside, with water stains scattered on the floor. The background features light-colored walls and arched windows, with natural light streaming in from outside. The overall lighting is soft, creating a fresh and slightly whimsical atmosphere.

cells.ssca: Medium shot, eye level, front view
cells.videoDesc: The shot is taken from a level angle, showing a man sitting on a four-poster bed made of honey, arranging the sheets. Honey slowly drips from the bed frame, forming a glossy puddle on the floor. Warm yellow light fills the room, creating a sweet and dreamy atmosphere. The camera can slightly pan or remain steady, emphasizing the flowing texture of the honey and the cozy feel of the room.
cells.visualDesc: In the scene, a man is sitting on the edge of a luxurious four-poster bed made of golden honey material. He is wearing a light-colored top and dark pants, barefoot, and is arranging the sheets with both hands. The bedposts and bed frame have a flowing honey texture, with honey dripping from the bed frame onto the floor forming a puddle. The room is bathed in warm light, and in the background, light-colored walls, a window, and curtains are visible. The overall atmosphere is dreamy and textured.

columns.name: 景别 + 构图 + 角度
